description:
American Horror Story: Hotel is about to add another AHS alum to its ranks: EW has exclusively learned that Lily Rabe, who has appeared on all four seasons of the FX anthology series, is in talks to play a — gasp! — serial killer on Hotel.《美国恐怖故事：旅馆》(American Horror Story: Hotel)即将在迎来一位老班底：曾出演过前几季的莉莉·拉贝(Lily Rabe)将要加盟该剧，饰演一个连环杀手！

TRabe most recently appeared last season on Freak Show, when her Asylum character, Sister Mary Eunice, popped up in a flashback involving Pepper (Naomi Grossman). In season 1, she portrayed loony mother/ghost Nora Montgomery and, in season 3’s Coven, she was hippie witch/Stevie Nicks superfan Misty Day. 大家现在能在ABC电视台的《私语者/天机密语》(The Whispers)中看到这位女演员，她将在今年秋天回归的《美国恐怖故事》中饰演这个所谓旅馆中的一个著名杀手。拉贝在上一季《美国恐怖故事：畸形秀》 (American Horror Story: Freak Show)的闪回剧情中出演了自己在第二季《疯人院》(Asylum)中的修女一角，在第一季中，她饰演了一个疯母亲，第三季《女巫集会》(Coven) 中则饰演了超级迷恋史蒂薇·妮克丝(Stevie Nicks)的强大女巫米丝蒂·戴(Misty Day)。

American Horror Story: Hotel premieres in October on FX and stars Lady Gaga, Matt Bomer, Sarah Paulson, Kathy Bates, Angela Bassett, Evan Peters, Finn Wittrock, Chloe Sevigny, Wes Bentley, and Cheyenne Jackson.  《美国恐怖故事：旅馆》将在今年10月回归，已经确认出演的演员有Lady Gaga，马特·波莫(Matt Bomer)、莎拉·保罗森(Sarah Paulson)、凯茜·贝茨(Kathy Bates)、安吉拉·贝塞特(Angela Bassett)、伊万·彼得斯(Evan Peters)、芬·维特洛克(Finn Wittrock)、科洛·塞维尼(Chloe Sevigny)、韦斯·本特利(Wes Bentley)和夏恩·杰克逊(Cheyenne Jackson)。
